summary: More variety and randomness in food barrels and sacks.
descriptionHtml:
My first mod upload! I spent way more time on this than I expected, so I figured I\\\'d share it to make it worthwhile.

It modifies the food found in sacks and barrels throughout the world, adding some variety and randomness. You should find most commonly potatoes, bread, goat cheese and meat (beef, venison, salmon), along with everything else and some rare treats, all packed in a way that tries to make sense. Quantities are much more random and you will occasionally get a full container (I hope you like potatoes!).

A second file adds a bit more meat to animals (2-4 on most, 1-2 on hare, chicken, goat) and removes the 10% chance of finding gold/ring in them. I kept it on the trolls.
author: silverfish
